subject: Re: [junit] jUnit bug? textui - no errors, gui - errors.
msgSnippet: ... My system has one. I assume JUnit creates it automatically. Perhaps you have an old version of JUnit, or maybe the directory that Java thinks is your home
messageBody:
"Bret Waldow" <Bret.Waldow@...> wrote:
> Thanks for this information. I am running on Windows NT (don't look at me,
> it's their idea) and I can't find any junit.properties file on the system.
> Do you have any information about this?

My system has one. I assume JUnit creates it automatically. Perhaps you have
an old version of JUnit, or maybe the directory that Java thinks is your home
directory isn't writable.


Erik
